name: Polly's Car Tycoon
description:
Have you ever imagined running your own car dealership tycoon?

Build your car factory, earn gold, create an empire from scratch, hire employees, and level up your factory.
Your main goal in this exciting new car dealership simulator is to build cars and sell them to customers.

Every part of your car factory needs to be managed responsibly. Improve cars, and choose what type of manager you are.

If you like earning and spending cash - this tycoon game is for you.
Station upgrades, car parking, car dealership building - they are all waiting for you!

Remember to level up often - it will make your business grow!

All parts of your car factory are important:
- warehouse
- car production line
- workstations
- car parking
- car dealership

Make your customers happy by buying upgrades to your factory.
Some customers look for casual cars and others look for business cars.
Your task is to be the best manager and choose the right one.

Develop different marketing strategies, make cars, build and upgrade them.
You can change the colours of your cars.

Earn gold in the idle game style or tap to build a car faster.
Manage your workers by levelling up.
Expand your Idle Car Dealership Tycoon to become the best Idle Car Factory on the whole earth or maybe even the galaxy!

As a car manufacturer, you must think like a customer. Choose carefully which car you need to build and upgrade.


Enjoy this Idle Car Dealership Tycoon Game!
